description:
Arle has to graduate from Kindergarten.  The method?  Find the Final Exam Certificate!  Don't remember this story?
You only know about the puzzle game?  Uhhh BAYOEN BAYOEN ICE STOOOMU DIACUTO.

MadouMonogatari.description:
**Initial Release**

This release may have some bugs, so play at your own risk, but currently several runs have completed.

Known Issues/To-Dos:
- There's no EXP/Cookies gain option.  Need to do research on it.
- Secret Stone and Diacute Spell locations only give a generic "you got an item" versus most others which tell you what's there, due to re-using calls unlike the other ones.


EDIT: Quick edit of release.  Build feature fucked me.
MadouMonogatari.title: Madou Monogatari Randomizer v1.0.0

MadouMonogatari101.description: This just fixes the initial attempt to use the build method.  Its smaller, might work for more people, so why not.
MadouMonogatari101.title: Madou Monogatari Randomizer v1.0.1

MadouMonogatari102.description:
Bugfixes:
- Fix logic error that would put Ornery Shelf early without being able to fight Sukiyapodes.
- Fix logic error where its logical to fight "level 1" enemies with no combat spells.
MadouMonogatari102.title: Madou Monogatari Randomizer v1.0.2

MadouMonogatari103.description:
Bugfixes:
- Fix Sukiyapodes Reward 2 not sending
- Fix Ancient Village exploding in general


Known bug:
- If the player has flight paths randomized and doesn't have 2 flight paths, they can still talk to the squirrel in Ancient Village and it causes a softlock.
MadouMonogatari103.title: Madou Monogatari Randomizer v1.0.3
